Projects.title: Gesture It
Projects.subtitle: Python, TensorFlow, Keras, AppleScript, OOP
Projects.description: This project covers two specific areas of Artificial intelligence which are Machine Learning (Deep Learning) and Computer Vision, the major technology we have relied on while working on it is Artificial Neural Networks and more precisely Convolutional Neural Networks. we have developed a program that made it possible to have the computer identifies the different hand gestures that get shown to its camera and execute the correspond command that is mapped to that gesture, a simple example could be running the program and have your hand represent the number 0, 1 or the punch symbol or any other gesture and the program will know which command to execute whether increase the volume, play a Spotify song, shut down the laptop and so on and so forth.

Projects.title: Solve It
Projects.subtitle: Pure Python, OOP
Projects.description: This project covers different algorithms used as search algorithms in AI such as the A*, Depth-first, Greedy… This is a tool adapted to solve puzzle games, such as Peg Solitaire, 8 Puzzle, and Missionaries & Cannibals.  All the user has to do is to choose the puzzle, the algorithm, the initial state, and the goal state. The Programs runs the algorithm which could in some cases fail by running into an infinite loop which is normal.

Projects.title: Roomedia
Projects.subtitle: React Native (Ios & Android), Drupal, Javascript
Projects.description: This project is composed of two applications, the first one is a Tablet application (Customized tablet with Red, Orange, and Green Led lights) for displaying the actual and next meetings for a specific meeting room, and mobile application for booking a meeting room. The Project was designed and Developed for a client.

Projects.title: Covid Reporter
Projects.subtitle: React Native (Ios & Android), Javascript
Projects.description: This project which was developed as a proposition for the Moroccan Governement to help during the Covid Crysis by reporting the Agressions, Inflations, and Regroupments of People. This application was designed and developed for a client.

Projects.title: Tikfans
Projects.subtitle: React Native (Ios & Android), Javascript
Projects.description: This application helps people follow each other on TikTok to get more followers and likes. The idea behind this application is to let people register in the application using their own tiktok username, the application retrieves information about the user from TikTok, then the user needs to collect points to get its profile showcased on the finder section in the application and get more followers and likes. This application was designed and developed for a client.

Projects.title: Askme
Projects.subtitle: Swift 4, Storyboards
Projects.description: This application concretisizes the new trend of polls and Q&As used in Instagram and Facebook in Snapchat using the SNAP KIT SDK. The application will be released in the App Store.

Projects.title: Chaincoin: Blockchain Cryptocurrency
Projects.subtitle: Nodejs, Python, React Native (Expo)
Projects.description: This project is based on Blockchain concepts to integrate a fully connected cryptocurrency, compatible with the blocks mining, transactions security, and peer to peer connection. I developed this project as a final project for my Bachelor in SUPINFO INTERNATIONAL UNIVERSITY. The Project is composed of 2 parts, the backend code which integrates all the concepts of blockchain and a wallet application which consumes the backend functionnalities

Projects.title: 21 Days Face Yoga
Projects.subtitle: Java Android
Projects.description: This application is a written in Java as a simple guide on how to practice Face Yoga fro Women and get results in less than 21 days. The application is already released on the Play Store

Projects.title: Portfolio: www.lahkimomar.me
Projects.subtitle: ReactJS, JSON Parsing
Projects.description: My personal portfolio which is available on github Free and Open Source.

Projects.title: Instagram Automation Script
Projects.subtitle: Python, Nodejs
Projects.description: This project is simply an automation tool written in Python to simplify my process of driving organic traffic to instagram pages, the first version had 3 modes: scanning mode (scrapping), Following mode, and unfollowing mode. The next version was written in Javascript (Nodejs) which consumes a private API of Instagram, in this version I integrated more useful functionnalities and modes.
